heading: Crusaders’ Monument Stronghold – Diablo 4
content: Crusaders' Monument Stronghold is a Stronghold in Hawezar, it can be found by searching with our . Strongholds are bastions of evil located around the world of Diablo 4. When you come across them, your task is to liberate them from the occupying hellspawn! As a reward, you get a big amount of and some turn into central hubs with Waypoints, some become inhabited with vendors and artisans or unlock new Enter the Crusaders' Monument from either of the 3 entrances. Move to the center of the circle and destroy the Undead that surround the Monument. Investigate the corpse that lies next to the Brazier, pick up the Skull and interact with the Ritual Brazier. Numerous white diamond shapes appear on your map. Each of them marks the location of a Graverobber's corpse. Check them for more and place them in the Ritual Brazier to fill up the progress bar on the right of your screen. When the bar is filled, 3  ghosts of appear that you'll need to defeat. The first champion fights by himself, the other two fight together once you destroyed the first one.
